text: Heidi Lynne Fleiss (born December 30, 1965 in Los Angeles) is an American television personality and columnist, regularly featured in American media.www.biography.com She is often called "Hollywood Madam" (formerly she was a madam and for a short time a prostitute) and is a periodic guest on Fox News programs. Her father was Paul M. Fleiss. She is of Jewish descent. Fleiss had been convicted of tax evasion and spent some time in prison. She was in a domestic partnership with Dennis Hof until his death in October 2018. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American columnists Category:American prisoners Category:American prostitutes Category:American sex industry businesspeople Category:Brothel owners and madams Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Jewish American criminals Category:Jewish American entertainers Category:Jewish American writers Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish sex industry people Category:Television personalities from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Heidi Fleiss
